title: Who Could Buy Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.15.20
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about reports that AT&T is selling Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. 

Time Stamps - 
00:02:00 - Housekeeping
Thank you to everyone who watched the Guerrilla Collective this weekend. We teamed up with the Media Indie Exchange to showcase nearly 90 games, and y’all came out to support. Thank you!
The finale to Nick’s playthrough of The Last of Us is up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames.
ALSO up on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames is our Core Games Let’s Play where we reveal the winners of the Kinda Funny Game Jam.
We Have Cool Friends today is Elizabeth Tulloch, Lois from Superman & Lois on the CW. That’s happening right after this on Twitch and later on Youtube.com/KindaFunny
EA Play is happening Thursday at 4pm pt and we’ll be reacting live to it right here on twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mohammed Mohammed, Conner Nolan, Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:18 - WB Games is up for sale - Rebekah Valentine @ GiBiz
00:21:00 -  - Best Friends Q:Krajookee
00:24:30 - Xbox has clarified how exactly Smart Delivery works - blog postXbox has clarified how exactly Smart Delivery works - blog post
00:38:40 - Star Wars: Squadrons has been officially revealed - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:38:42 - Niantic is promoting 1,000 small businesses in Pokemon Go for free for a year - Rebekah Valentine @GiBiz
00:40:35 - Out today
00:43:40 -  Ad
00:57:40 - Squad Up: ToiletToads(Discord) ToiletToads#2134
00:58:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Imran
